chapter.title: System Requirements
chapter.para: The requirements for hardware and software are shown in the following table. Anyframe can be used in the system that does not meet the requirements written below, but for fast performance the requirements below are recommended. The storage below includes all related files such as the whole Anyframe setup files and Eclipse, Tomcat and MiPlatform setup files, and Anyframe alone takes up less than 1GB. Software requirements should be fulfilled at all times.

The hardware requirements below is recommended when Anyframe IDE Eclipse Plugin is used, and when Anyframe-based applications are developed not using Anyframe IDE, Anyframe can be used for specifications lower than are shown below.
